attributes.action: Encourage Downing Streeet to encourage NEW LINE cinema to change the name of Golden Compass to 'Northern Lights'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you have read the 'His Dark Materials' trilogy, you might like to hear that they are bringing out a film of Northern Lights (the first book). Except that they aren't calling it that. They are calling it 'The Golden Comass', which, as you might agree, doesn't have the same effect. If you do agree, please sign, and get them to change the name before the release date.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
